text: Zai zhishi jianglin tamen hou, youyu tamen huxiang du ji cai fen wei zongpai. Yao bushi ni de zhu youyanzaixian, yao dao yige dingqi, name, tamen zhi jian de shi biding bei panjuele. Naxie zai tamen [ru youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] zhihou jicheng jingdian [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei”] de ren, tamen dui ci [yisilan jiao huo “gulanjing”] que shi zai yanzhong de huaiyi zhong.
